attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ANIMAL TESTING HAS TO STOP.

THIS IS ONE CRUEL FACTOR OF LIFE THAT CAN BE CHANGED IF THIS IS DEALT WITH.

PLEASE SIGN THIS TO HELP MAKE A STOP TO ANIMAL TESTING. GORDON BARLOW FIFE UK

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
